title: The Great Plains
prompt: A wide-angle photograph taken from a county road at golden hour, showing vast wheat fields stretching to a distant horizon under an overcast sky, with a weathered grain elevator or ranch structure silhouetted in the middle distance and a single vehicle or figure barely visible on the roadâ€”emphasizing emptiness and scale. Shot in documentary style with muted ochre and gray tones, conveying quiet desolation without sentimentality, the landscape itself as the subject rather than human activity.
